properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 11 at 10:04PM EST until February 14 at 6:18AM EST by NWS Wakefield VA
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in
Virginia...

Appomattox River At Mattoax affecting Amelia...Chesterfield and
Powhatan Counties

...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Virginia..

Meherrin River At Lawrenceville affecting Brunswick County

Nottoway River At Sebrell affecting Southampton County


For the Appomattox Basin...including Mattoax...Minor flooding is
occurring and is expected to continue.For the Chowan Basin...
including Lawrenceville...Sebrell...Minor flooding is occurring and
is expected to continue.

The Flood Warning continues for...
The Meherrin River At Lawrenceville
* from Wednesday morning to Friday morning...or until the warning is
cancelled.
* At 08:15 PM Tuesday the stage was 10.5 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Flood stage is 15.0 feet.
* Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage
Wednesday morning and will continue rising to near 19.9 feet by
Thursday morning. The river will fall below flood stage early
Friday morning.
This river level is comparable to a previous crest of 20.0 feet on
Dec 13 2008.
